reviewText: this was a very good hentai in my opinion. The hentai is about a spirit that poses-es girls that call upon it from a wiji board. and than it gets into a bunch of sex with trying to stop the evil spirit. but over all i thought it was very good

This series seems to me like a hentai series that resembles that to a hentai version of Ghostbusters. I got to say I wasn't impressed but I did enjoy it. I think it would make a good series on Adult Swim if the sex scenes were removed.

This is an analogue to the Bible Black tales. It lacks the intensity of BB but it is
not bad considering how short it is.
It is divided into two tales with moderate witchery and lusty moments. The graphics are good and the sound is equally so. It is a good diversionary moment but don't expect the drive of the original BB.

I thoroughly enjoyed watching this anmie, it is by far a favorite of mine. The two episodes on the disc(not enough, BOO HOO!) had good stories and plotted well. Although there is explicit sex, all of it is in context to drive the story, and it's not too over the top. So for anyone who wants to see adult anime with good story, watch this one.

Almost everything about this title is outstanding-animation, character designs, sex scenes, even the English Dub works for me!
It's about a school club that specializes in exorcising spirits from peoples' bodies WITH SEX SPELLS. It's obvious that the same animators responsible for Bible Black had a hand in this- it just looks great.

Problem? This series has potential to be as popular as Bible Black or Disipline but so far only these 2 episodes are available (as far as I know). There IS an end to the story but not a definite one, leaving it open for more episodes.

I truly hope they continue with this crazy hentai.
Great hentai and if you like Bible Black, you will enjoy this one!
Boring and forgetful story
thank you
Great service and enjoyed DVD
Terrible artwork here...not a lot of love given to this one for the art of its anime.
as anime goes its alright
I like the stories, just wish that there were more of them.

Animation quality was decent. Voicework was a tad forced. Story is a bit bland. It gets across the fact that it is a hentai, but doesnt really excel at it. Also, while it may be made from the same people as Bible Black (as printed on the cover) it doesnt really compare at all to it.
Didn't work at all I needed more action
Very disappointing. I had hoped for more from the producers of Bible Black.

Great story line, hope for a continuation of this story. First time in long time that the sex action didn't bother the story line which was very good. Nothing over the top, enjoyed watching this one, will have it on the library shelf.

I don't watch much hentai and this in particular reminded me why. There is a good story lurking in here which is spoilt by the sex. Seems strange to say it but that's how I saw it. There are only two episodes and the plot may seem familiar from other anime such as ghost hunt. The characterization is better than many series but the means of exorcism through sexual activity overpowers the plot. That's a shame.
The movie is good in what it was trying to get across though the dialogue seem stilted and didn't fit the action.  Still it was a hoot in trying to Americanize an anime piece.

This was OK I guess. Was hoping for a little more bang for my buck, but oh well. There were not very many sex scenes, and some of the only potentially very good sex (well, rape actually) scenes get interrupted before it gets good - this was a MAJOR let-down. Still, there are worse titles out there. But there are also certainly much better ones to get instead of this.

If you're a fan of these kind of movies, there are certain things you expect in order to be happy with your purchase. Sex Craft has all of that. It has beautiful girls, a sensual plot, and all the other things that will make you happy that I doubt I can write on here. This is a great purchase, highly recommended.

Even it this dvd is from the creators of Bible Black Only, the "sex craft" lacks of too many scenes in this one. If it this is your fourth of fifth dvd of this gender it passes, but if it is your first, u just think it twice.
I like this dvd because it was good just like all the other henti dvd's I have.  Plenty of "h" stuff going on and awesome kid ghost butt scenes.
Like everything .... Good idea to do something like that....  So you should buy it . . . . .
Sex Craft was recieved in good shape and play great. I hope all movies will be like this one and others.

As with a lot of Japanese Anime, this is NOT for anyone under 18! VERY graphic sex scenes and extreme violence! A group of young girls mess around with a Witchboard and get more than just the game they thought they were playing! They accidentally summon an evil spirit/demon! The ghost/demon turns the girls into Succubus', female psychic vampires. They are beings that feed on human souls/lifeforces. They do this by having sex with men and draining them of their life energy during the encounter. One girl seeks advice from a priest because she does not want to be a Succubus anymore. Others, and her, must now fight with a new threat; a man with dark magic powers that is far more than he appears to be, maybe an Incubus, a male psychic vampire. The girls/Succubus' are not the only ones who like soul energy for power! You get the idea. This movie is rated R but is borderline porn. Once again, I do not recommend this to anyone under 18 or anyone with purity for reilgious purpose mindset.
Was very good but it left you wandering what dvd title to look out for to watch the rest of the story  ? But still happy !
Who buys porn these days? The only reason I did was because I was on a medication called wellbutrin and it caused me to buy a bunch of crap I didn't need.
Like Bible Black this is a trip, a bit lighter in tone though.
